document_data.mainbody:
The Apple Tree Inn was a ryokan (inn) in Aru in Wa in the 1770s on the Wa Calendar. Small and unremarkable, it stood in the Pilgrim District, near the gate to the Shining Temple of Bishamon, and was likely named for the temples sacred apple tree.
The thief Komatsu stayed at The Apple Tree Inn in , and mightve been confronted by adventurers there.
